translations.chinese: 懷王者，吾家所立耳，非有功伐，何以得專主約！
translations.english: King Huai was established by my family, he has no meritorious achievements. Why should he monopolize the agreements!
Originally it was the generals and I who pacified the world."

translations.chinese: 春正月，陽尊懷王為義帝，實不用其命。
translations.english: In the first month of spring, Yang honored King Huai as Righteous Emperor, but in reality did not follow his commands.

translations.chinese: 二月，羽自立為西楚霸王，王梁、楚地九郡，都彭城。
translations.english: In the second month, Xiang Yu established himself as Hegemon King of Western Chu, ruling the lands of Liang and Chu, nine commanderies, with capital at Pengcheng.

translations.chinese: 背約，更立沛公為漢王，王巴、蜀、漢中四十一 縣，都南鄭。
translations.english: Breaking the agreement, he further established Pei Gong as King of Han, ruling Ba, Shu, Hanzhong, and 41 counties, with capital at Nanzheng.
